modName: Glowing Eyes For Grimoa's Vampire Lord
summary: This mod Simply Adds Glowing Eyes For Grimoa's Vampire Lord.
descriptionHtml:
Tired of those pitch black eyes? Want the despair of your vampire lord's gaze to pierce through the souls of your enemies? If so then you have come to the right place. This mod simply replaces the pitch black eyes of the vampire lord with the glowing red eyes from Weich's mod.
here:http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21960/?

This mod contains Grimoas files with her armor and wings so just drop this inside your skyrim folder, I also recommend these two mods.

DrFring's Vampire Lord Retexture: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23775/?

Wasbunny's Ancient Black Dragonscale armor: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10363/? (Should you be wearing the royal vampire lord armor)

Credit to the mod authors mentioned to make this possible.


I forgot to include the female version, but I fixed it, sorryyyy!
author: Coolo316 Grimoa And Weich

files.name: Glowing eyes for Grimoa's vampire lord
